channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Don't wait for the Perseids in August — look for meteors this week
item.description: A bright moon will make it hard to see the Perseid meteor shower in mid-August, but one night this week offers a decent chance of seeing some shooting...

item.title: Outrage Grows Over Starvation in Gaza, and a Mysterious Pentagon Budget Line
item.description: Plus, a very D.I.Y. act of defiance.

item.title: Rural Oklahoma kids were getting more counselors — then federal cuts pulled funding

item.title: Some kids need more protection from ultra-processed food. Here's why

item.title: Do 'work requirements' in Medicaid work? Georgia's been trying it for two years
item.description: Most states will have to establish work requirements for Medicaid by 2027. Georgia has had them for two years. Some Georgians say the glitchy system m...

item.title: ‘Revenge Is Not a Policy’: Israelis Voice Dissent Against the War in Gaza
item.description: After a long silence, prominent Israelis and activists are increasingly raising alarms about potential war crimes being carried out by the government.

item.title: Nevada Democrats Spot an Opportunity in a Vulnerable G.O.P. Governor
item.description: The state attorney general, Aaron Ford, is seen as Democrats’ best bet to oust Gov. Joe Lombardo. Mr. Lombardo doesn’t plan on going down easy.

item.title: Mental health warnings on social media? Minnesota will require them next year

item.title: Shooting at Bangkok Market Leaves Several People Dead
item.description: The gunman killed five people at Or Tor Kor market, which is popular with tourists, before dying by suicide, the authorities said.
